=== Last Position ===
(row = 6, col = 5)

Given that my avatar's position has not changed from the last state, I should analyze the surroundings and determine a new meaningful action. 

The current map layout indicates I am at (6, 5), and I have important sprites around. Notably, to the right at (6, 12) there are several dollar signs indicating resources, and at (6, 30) there is a portal ammo sprite. 

To make progress without moving, I need to first ensure that I am facing the direction of my next objective. Therefore, I will first rotate to the right and then decide on the next step.

Since standing still won't accomplish anything, I will execute a clockwise motion, which should prepare for further actions.

``` Action: 3 ``` 

This action will align my avatar to the right, potentially positioning me better for future resource collection or combat engagements.
